title: The Journal of Sir Walter Scott; From the Original Manuscript at Abbotsford
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Then proceeded toBallingray or Bingray, and so by Kirkness, where late ravages aresupplied by the force of vegetation down to the shores of Lochleven.

title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
snippet: Another friend (and he had, I think, none more dear), the late Margaret Maclean Clephane of Torloisk, afterwards  Marchioness of Northampton, writes thus from Kirkness, in Kinross-shire, on the 11th October : —
